name: Ghost Cleaner (itch)
description:
You are a friendly poltergeist trying to keep the house tidy while avoiding scaring anyone!

Made for Ludum Dare 42 and Weekly Game Jam 57.

Timelapse

Let's Play by YourBr0ther (game at 3:30)

Credits

  • Game made using GameMaker: Studio 1.4
  • Graphics made using Aseprite
  • Sound FX made using ChipTone
  • Bit Quest (background music) by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
